S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Transmission Time
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The time in the day when scheduled transmissions start.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Minute Past Every Hour
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The minute past every hour when a routine transmission starts.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Minute (time) is a closed interval going from 0 to 59 seconds (time) and indicated the duration of a period of time.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Minute Past Odd Hours
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The minute past odd hours when a routine transmission starts.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Minute (time) is a closed interval going from 0 to 59 seconds (time) and indicated the duration of a period of time.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Interoperability Identifier
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: A common unique identifier for entities which describe a single real-world feature, and which is used to identify instances of the feature in end-user systems where the feature may be included in multiple data product types.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Minute Past Even Hours
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The minute past even hours when a routine transmission starts.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Minute (time) is a closed interval going from 0 to 59 seconds (time) and indicated the duration of a period of time.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Time of Day Start
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The time corresponding to the start of an active period.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: The time of day start must be encoded using 2 digits for the hour (hh), 2 digits for the minutes(mm) and 2 digits for the seconds (ss). This conforms to ISO 8601:2004.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Time of Day End
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The time corresponding to the end of an active period.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: The time of day end must be encoded using 2 digits for the hour (hh), 2 digits for the minutes(mm) and 2 digits for the seconds (ss). This conforms to ISO 8601:2004.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Day of Week is Range
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: A statement expressing if the days of the week identified define a range or not.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: A True value is an indication that the identified days of the week define a range between and inclusive of those days.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Day of Week
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Any one of seven days in a week.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: Sunday
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The first day of the week.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 월요일
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The second day of the week.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 화요일
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The third day of the week.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 수요일
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The fourth day of the week.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 목요일
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The fifth day of the week.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 금요일
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The sixth day of the week.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 토요일
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The seventh day of the week.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Category of Text
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Classification of completeness of textual information in relation to the source material from which it is derived.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 요약
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A statement summarizing the important points of a text.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 추출
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An excerpt or excerpts from a text.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 전체 텍스트
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The whole text.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Telecommunication Service
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Classification of methods of communication over a distance by electrical, electronic, or electromagnetic means.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 음성
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The transfer or exchange of information by using sounds that are being made by mouth and throat when speaking.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 팩시밀리
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A system of transmitting and reproducing graphic matter (as printing or still pictures) by means of signals sent over telephone lines.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: SMS
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Short Message Service is a form of text messaging communication on phones and mobile phones.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 데이터
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A representation of facts, concepts or instructions in a formalised manner suitable for communication, interpretation or processing.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 스트리밍된 데이터
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Data that is constantly received by and presented to an end-user while being delivered by a provider.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 텔렉스
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A system of communication in which messages are sent over long distances by using a telephone system and are printed by using a special machine (called a teletypewriter).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 전보
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An apparatus, system or process for communication at a distance by electric transmission over wire.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 이메일
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Messages and other data exchanged between individuals using computers in a network.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Telecommunication Identifier
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: An identifier, such as words, numbers, letters, symbols, or any combination of those used to establish a contact to a particular person, organisation or service.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Transmission Regularity
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Classification of regularity or conditions for transmission.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 연속
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Transmission is made continuously.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 정기적인
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Transmission is made regularly according to a schedule.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 수신시
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Transmission is made when warning or information is received from another authority.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 필요에 따라
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Transmission is made under specified conditions or when needed.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 요청시
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: When you ask for it.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Transmission Content
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Content of transmission.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Other than MSI.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Observation Time
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The time on each day when observations are made.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Signal Frequency
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The frequency of a signal.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Selective Call Number
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: When stations of the maritime mobile service (direct printing telegraphy) use selective calling devices, their Selective Call numbers (SELCAL) are formed of four digits (coast stations).

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Contact Instructions
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Instructions provided on how to contact a particular person, organisation or service.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Communication Channel
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: A channel number assigned to a specific radio frequency, frequencies or frequency band.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: The expected input is the specific VHF-Channel. The attribute 'communication channel' encodes the various VHF-channels used for communication.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Category of Radio Methods
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Categories of radiocommunications based on frequency band and radio traffic method.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 저주파수 음성 트래픽
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Frequency in a frequency range between 30 and 300 kHz used for voice traffic.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 중간주파수 음성 트래픽
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Frequency in a frequency range between 300 and 3000 kHz used for voice traffic.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 고주파 (HF) 음성 트래픽
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Frequency in a frequency range between 3 and 30 MHz used for voice traffic.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 초고주파 (VHF) 음성 트래픽
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Frequency in a frequency range between 30 and 300 MHz used for voice traffic.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 고주파 좁은 대역 직접 인쇄
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An automated direct printing service,in the high frequency range, similar to NAVTEX, but does not offer all of the same functionality such as avoiding repeated messages.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: NAVTEX
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The system for the broadcast and automatic reception of Maritime Safety Information by means of narrow-band direct-printing telegraphy.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: SafetyNET
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: SafetyNET is an international automatic direct-printing satellite-based service for the promulgation of navigational and meteorological warnings, meteorological forecasts and other urgent safety-related messages - maritime safety information (MSI) - to ships.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: NBDP 전신 (고주파 좁은 대역 직접 인쇄 전신)
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A communications system consisting of teletypewriters connected to a telephonic network to send and receive Narrow Band Direct Printing.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 팩시밀리
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A system of transmitting and reproducing graphic matter (as printing or still pictures) by means of signals sent over telephone lines.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: NAVIP
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A Russian system transmitting navigational information, sent by radio and containing information relevant to coastal waters of foreign countries and high seas.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 저주파수 디지털 트래픽
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Frequency in a frequency range between 30 and 300 kHz used for digital traffic.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 중간주파수 디지털 트래픽
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Frequency in a frequency range between 300 and 3000 kHz used for digital traffic.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 고주파 (HF) 디지털 트래픽
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Frequency in a frequency range between 3 and 30 MHz used for digital traffic.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 초고주파 (VHF) 디지털 트래픽
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Frequency in a frequency range between 30 and 300 MHz used for digital traffic.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 저주파수 전보 트래픽
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Frequency in a frequency range between 30 and 300 kHz used for telegraph traffic.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 중간주파수 전보 트래픽
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Frequency in a frequency range between 300 and 3000 kHz used for telegraph traffic.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 고주파 (HF) 전보 트래픽
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Frequency in a frequency range between 3 and 30 MHz used for telegraph traffic.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 중간주파수 디지털 선택 호출 트래픽
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Frequency in a frequency range between 300 and 3000 kHz used for Digital Selective Call traffic.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 고주파 (HF) 디지털 선택 호출 트래픽
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Frequency in a frequency range between 3 and 30 MHz used for Digital Selective Call traffic.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 초고주파 (VHF) 디지털 선택 호출 트래픽
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Frequency in a frequency range between 30 and 300 MHz used for Digital Selective Call traffic.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Category of Maritime Broadcast
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Classification of maritime broadcast based on the nature of information conveyed.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 항해 경보
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A message containing urgent information relevant to safe navigation broadcast to ships in accordance with the provisions of the International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea, 1974, as amended.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 기상 경보
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Warning of adverse weather conditions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 얼음 보고
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Report of the ice situation and restrictions to shipping.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: SAR 정보
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Broadcast message with information about an ongoing Search and Rescue operation.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 해적 공격 경보
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Warning of possible attack by pirates.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 기상 예보
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Broadcast message containing meteorological forecast.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 파일럿 서비스 메시지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Broadcast message about a pilot service.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: AIS 정보
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Broadcast message about AIS information.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: LORAN 메시지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Broadcast message about the LORAN service.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: SATNAV 메시지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Broadcast message about Satellite Navigation service.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 돌풍 경보
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Wind speeds between 34 and 47 knots (Beaufort scale wind force 8 and 9) are forecast or occurring.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 폭풍 경보
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Wind speeds between 48 and 63 knots (Beaufort scale wind force 10 or 11) are forecast or occurring.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 열대 저기압 경보
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Warning of hurricanes in the North Atlantic and eastern North Pacific, typhoons in the Western Pacific, cyclones in the Indian Ocean and cyclones of similar nature in other regions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: NAVAREA 경보
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Navigational warning or in-force bulletin promulgated as part of a numbered series by a NAVAREA coordinator.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 해안 경보
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A navigational warning, or in-force bulletin, promulgated as part of a numbered series by a National Coordinator.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 지역 경보
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Warning which covers inshore waters, often within the limits of jurisdiction of a harbour or port authority.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 저수위 경고/음수리류
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Warning of actual or expected low water level.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 얼음 경고
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Warning of accretion of ice on ships.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 쓰나미 방송
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Broadcasts about tsunamis, including watches, advisories, and other types of messages relating to tsunamis or potential tsunamis.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Restriction
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The official legal statute of each kind of restricted area.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Defines the kind of restriction(s), for example, the restriction for 'a game preserve' may be 'entry prohibited', the restriction for an 'anchoring prohibition' is 'anchoring prohibited'. The complete information about the restriction(s), actually held in handbooks or other publications, may be encoded using an Information type.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 닻을 내릴 수 없음
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which anchoring is not permitted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 닻을 내릴 수 있는 지역 제한
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which anchoring is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 어로 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which fishing is not permitted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 어로 제한
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which fishing is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 얽매기 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which trawling is not permitted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 얽매기 제한
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which trawling is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 진입 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which navigation and/or anchoring is prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 진입 제한
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which navigation is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 마모 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which dredging is not permitted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 마모 제한
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which dredging is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 다이빙 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which diving is not permitted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 다이빙 제한
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which diving is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 웨이크 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Mariners must adjust the speed of their vessels to reduce the wave or wash which may cause erosion or disturb moored vessels.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 피해야 할 지역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An IMO declared routeing measure comprising an area within defined limits in which either navigation is particularly hazardous or it is exceptionally important to avoid casualties and which should be avoided by all ships, or certain classes of ships.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 건설 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The erection of permanent or temporary fixed structures or artificial islands is prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 방류 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which discharging or dumping is prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 방류 제한
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A specified area designated by an appropriate authority, within which discharging or dumping is restricted in accordance with specified conditions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 산업 또는 광업 탐사/개발 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which industrial or mineral exploration and development are prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 산업 또는 광업 탐사/개발 제한
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A specified area designated by an appropriate authority, within which industrial or mineral exploration and development is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 드릴링 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which excavating a hole on the seabed with a drill is prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 드릴링 제한
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A specified area designated by an appropriate authority, within which excavating a hole on the seabed with a drill is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 역사적 유물 제거 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which the removal of historical artefacts is prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 화물 이송 (경감) 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area in which cargo transhipment (lightening) is prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 끌기 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area in which the dragging of anything along the bottom, for example bottom trawling, is prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 정지 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area in which a vessel is prohibited from stopping.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 상륙 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area in which landing is prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 속도 제한
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which speed is restricted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 추월 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which overtaking is generally prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 대열 간 추월 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which overtaking between convoys is prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 통과 또는 추월 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which passing or overtaking is generally prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 적선 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which vessels, assemblies of floating material or floating establishments may not berth.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 적선 제한
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which berthing is restricted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 부두에 결박 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which vessels, assemblies of floating material or floating establishments may not make fast to the bank.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 매달기 제한
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which making fast to the bank is restricted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 회전 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which all turning is generally prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 제한된 선로 깊이
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which the fairway depth is restricted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 제한된 선로 폭
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which the fairway width is restricted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 스퍼드 사용 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The use of anchoring spuds (telescopic piles) is prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 수영 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area in which swimming is prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: SOx 배출 제한
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which the emission of SOx is restricted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: NOx 배출 제한
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which the emission of NOx is restricted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 동력 선박 금지
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which any vessel propelled by machinery is prohibited.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Status
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The condition of an object at a given instant in time.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 영구적
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Intended to last or function indefinitely.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 때때로
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Acting on special occasions; happening irregularly.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 권장됨
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Presented as worthy of confidence, acceptance, use, etc.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 사용 안 함
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Use has ceased, but the facility still exists intact; disused.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 주기적/간헐적
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Recurring at intervals.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 예약됨
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Set apart for some specific use.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 임시
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Meant to last only for a time.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 개인적
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Administered by an individual or corporation, rather than a State or a public body.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 의무적
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Compulsory; enforced.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 소멸함
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: No longer lit.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 발광함
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Lit by flood lights, strip lights, etc.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 역사적
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Famous in history; of historical interest.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 공공적
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Belonging to, available to, used or shared by, the community as a whole and not restricted to private use.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 동기화됨
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Occur at a time, coincide in point of time, be contemporary or simultaneous.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 감시됨
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Looked at or observed over a period of time especially so as to be aware of any movement or change.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 감시되지 않음
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Usually automatic in operation, without any permanently-stationed personnel to superintend it.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 존재 의심
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A feature that has been reported but has not been definitely determined to exist.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 요청시
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: When you ask for it.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 하강함
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: To become lower in level.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 상승함
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: To become higher in level.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 증가함
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Becoming larger in magnitude.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 감소함
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Becoming smaller in magnitude.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 강함
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Not easily broken or destroyed.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 양호함
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: In a satisfactory condition to use.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 보통
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Fairly but not very.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 나쁨
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Not as good as it could be or should.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 부표가 달림
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Marked by buoys.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 완전히 운영 중
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Entire observation platform is operating in accordance with, or exceeding, manufacturer specifications.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 부분적으로 운영 중
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: At least one instrument that is part of an observation platform is not operating to manufacturer specification.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 드리프트 중
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Floating platform at the mercy of environmental elements, whether intentional or not.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 파손됨
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Fractured or in pieces.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 오프라인
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Observation platform is intentionally not reporting an environmental observation.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 중단됨
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Observation station, suite of instruments, or an individual instrument, for a particular location, has been removed and is no longer at the particular location.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 수동 관측
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Observations made by a human observer.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 알려지지 않은 상태
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Status of an observation platform, suite of instruments, or individual instrument is not known or unspecified.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 확인됨
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Made certain as to truth, accuracy, validity, availability, etc.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 후보
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Item selected for an action.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 수정 중
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Item that is in the process of being modified.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 제거/삭제 중
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Item in the process of being removed or deleted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 제거됨/삭제됨
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Item that has been removed or deleted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 수정 후보
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Item selected for modification.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Category of Communication Preference
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Classification of frequencies, VHF channels, telephone numbers, or other means of communication based on preference.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 우선 호출
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The first choice channel or frequency to be used when calling a radio station.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 대체 호출
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A channel or frequency to be used for calling a radio station when the preferred channel or frequency is busy or is suffering from interference.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 우선 작업
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The first choice channel or frequency to be used when working with a radio station.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 대체 작업
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A channel or frequency to be used for working with a radio station when the preferred working channel or frequency is busy or is suffering from interference.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Jurisdiction
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The jurisdiction applicable to an administrative area.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 국제적
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Involving more than one country; covering more than one national area.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 국내적
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area administered or controlled by a single nation.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 국가 하위 구분
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area smaller than the nation in which it lies.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Category of Restricted Area
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The official legal status of each kind of restricted area defines the kind of restriction(s), for example the restriction for a 'game reserve' may be 'entering prohibited'.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 해상 안전 구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The area around an offshore installation within which vessels are prohibited from entering without permission. Special regulations protect installations within a safety zone and vessels of all nationalities are required to respect the zone.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 자연 보호구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A tract of land or water managed so as to preserve its flora, fauna, physical features, etc.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 새 보호구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A place where birds are bred and protected.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 사냥 보호구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A place where wild animals or birds hunted for sport or food are kept undisturbed for private use.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 물개 보호구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A place where seals are protected.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 자석 해제 범위
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area, usually about two cables diameter, within which ships' magnetic fields may be measured; sensing instruments and cables are installed on the seabed in the range and there are cables leading from the range to a control position ashore.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 군사 구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area controlled by the military in which restrictions may apply.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 역사적 잔해 구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area around certain wrecks of historical importance to protect the wrecks from unauthorized interference by diving, salvage or deposition (including anchoring).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 항로 보조 구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area around a navigational aid which vessels are prohibited from entering.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 지뢰 구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area laid and maintained with explosive mines for defence or practice purposes.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 수영 구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area in which people may swim and therefore vessel movement may be restricted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 대기 구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area reserved for vessels waiting to enter a harbour.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 연구 구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area where marine research takes place.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 파국 구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area where dredging is taking place.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 어류 보호구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A place where fish (including shellfish and crustaceans) are protected.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 생태 보호구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A tract of land or water managed so as to preserve the relation of plants and living creatures to each other and to their surroundings.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 노 웨이크 구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area in which a vessels' speed must be reduced in order to reduce the size of the wake it produces.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 회전 구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area where vessels turn.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 워터 스키 구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which people may water ski and therefore vessel movement may be restricted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 환경적으로 민감한 해양 구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A generic term which may be used to describe a wide range of areas, considered sensitive for a variety of environmental reasons.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 특히 민감한 해양 구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area that needs special protection through action by IMO because of its significance for regional ecological, socio-economic or scientific reasons and because it may be vulnerable to damage by international shipping activities.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 분리 구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area near a fairway where vessels can go to clear the way or make an about turn and possibly return to a waiting area when nautical conditions impose it.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 항구 보안 구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area in which defence, law and treaty enforcement, and counter-terrorism activities that fall within the port and maritime domain apply.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 산호 보호구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A place where coral is protected.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 레크리에이션 구역
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which recreational activities regularly take place and therefore vessel movement may be restricted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 선박 오염 배출 통제
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which the ship pollution emission is controlled.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Date Start
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The earliest date on which an object (for example a buoy) will be present.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: The Date Start should be encoded using 4 digits for the calendar year (YYYY), 2 digits for the month (MM) (for example April = 04) and 2 digits for the day (DD). When no specific month and/or day is required/known, indication of the month and/or day is omitted, and replaced with dashes (-). When no specific year is required (that is, the event or date range ends at the same time each year) the following two cases may be considered:- same day each year: ----MMDD- same month each year: ----MM--This conforms to ISO 8601: 2004. Date Start indicates the earliest date of an event or the start of a date range. It is used to indicate the start of a fixed date range, the start of a periodic date range, or the deployment or implementation of a feature at a specific date in the future.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Frequency Shore Station Receives
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The shore station receiver frequency.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Examples: 4379.1 kHz becomes 043791; 13162.8 kHz becomes 131628.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Date End
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The latest date on which an object (for example a buoy) will be present.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: The Date End should be encoded using 4 digits for the calendar year (YYYY), 2 digits for the month (MM) (for example April = 04) and 2 digits for the day (DD). When no specific month and/or day is required/known, indication of the month and/or day is omitted, and replaced with dashes (-). When no specific year is required (that is, the event or date range ends at the same time each year) the following two cases may be considered:- same day each year: ----MMDD- same month each year: ----MM--This conforms to ISO 8601: 2004. Date End indicates the latest date of an event or the end of a date range. It is used to indicate the end of a fixed date range, the end of a periodic date range, or the removal or cancellation of a feature at a specific date in the future.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Name
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The individual name of a feature.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Index of Cooperation
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: A factor governing the image resolution of radiofax transmissions.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: (i) The Index of Cooperation must be known to decode the transmission; (ii) The Index of Cooperation is generally 576, although 288 with alternate line scanning is sometimes used.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Drum Speed
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The drum speed in revolutions per minute.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: The drum speed should be encoded using three digits for the speed including a leading zero if necessary.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Delivery Point
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Details of where post can be delivered such as the apartment, name and/or number of a street, building or PO Box.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Display Name
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: A statement expressing if a feature name is to be displayed in certain system display settings or not.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Where it is allowable to encode multiple instances of feature name for a single feature instance, only one feature name instance can indicate that the name is to be displayed (display name set to True).

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: City Name
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The name of a town or city.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Language
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The method of human communication, either spoken or written, consisting of the use of words in a structured and conventional way.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: The language is encoded by a 3 character code following ISO 639-2/T.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Source Indication
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Information about the source document, publication, or reference from which object data or textual material included or referenced in a dataset are derived.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Content of featureName is source authority name.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Postal Code
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Known in various countries as a postcode, or ZIP code, the postal code is a series of letters and/or digits that identifies each postal delivery area.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Country Name
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The name of a nation.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Administrative Division
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: A generic term for an administrative region within a country at a level below that of the sovereign state.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Frequency Shore Station Transmits
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The shore station transmitter frequency.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Examples: 4379.1 kHz becomes 043791; 13162.8 kHz becomes 131628.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: File Locator
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The location of a fragment of text or other information in a support file.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Application schemas must describe how the associated file is identified. The associated file will commonly be named in a file reference co-attribute of the same complex attribute. Each DCEG must specify requirements for the format of the associated file and the semantics of file locator. For example, the value of file locator may be an HTML ID in an HTML file, line number in a text file) or a bookmark in a PDF file.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: File Reference
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The file name of an externally referenced text file.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Headline
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Words set at the head of a passage or page to introduce or categorize.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Text
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: A non-formatted digital text string.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Should be used, for example, to hold the information that is for short cautionary or explanatory notes. Therefore, text populated in text must not exceed 300 characters. Text may be in English, or in a national language. No formatting of text is possible within text. If formatted text, or text strings exceeding 300 characters, is required, then an alternate concept should be used.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Linkage
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Location (address) for online access using a URL/URI address or similar addressing scheme.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Name of Resource
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Name of the online resource.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Category of Vessel Traffic Service
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Classification of vessel traffic services based on the nature of the control or services provided.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 정보 서비스
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A service to ensure that essential information becomes available in time for on-board navigational decision-making.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 교통 조직 서비스
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A service to assist on-board navigational decision-making and to monitor its effects.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 항로 지원 서비스
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A service to prevent the development of dangerous maritime traffic situations and to provide for the safe and efficient movement of vessel traffic within the VTS area.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 선박 보고 서비스
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A service established by a relevant authority consisting of one or more reporting points or lines at which ships are required to report their identity, course, speed and other data to the monitoring authority.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: 지역 항구 서비스
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A service established to provide port information without interaction between the customer and the service provider. This information could be inter-alia berthing information, availability of port services, shipping schedules, meteorological and hydrological data.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Category of Marine Protected Area
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Classification of marine protected areas based on IUCN (International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources) categories.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: IUCN 1a 유형
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Strict Nature Reserve: Protected area managed mainly for science.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: IUCN 1b 유형
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Wilderness Area: Protected area managed mainly for wilderness protection.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: IUCN 2 유형
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: National Park: Protected area managed mainly for ecosystem protection and recreation.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: IUCN 3 유형
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Natural Monument: Protected area managed mainly for conservation of specific natural features.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: IUCN 4 유형
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Habitat/Species Management Area: Protected area managed mainly for conservation through management intervention.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: IUCN 5 유형
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Protected Landscape/Seascape: Protected area managed mainly for landscape/seascape conservation and recreation.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: IUCN 6 유형
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Managed Resource Protected Area: Protected area managed mainly for the sustainable use of natural ecosystems.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Contact Address
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Direction or superscription of a letter, package, etc., specifying the name of the place to which it is directed, and optionally a contact person or organisation who should receive it.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Feature Name
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Provides the name of an entity, defines the national language of the name, and provides the option to display the name at various system display settings.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Fixed Date Range
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: An active period of a single fixed event or occurrence, as the date range between discrete start and end dates.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Dates must be encoded in the format YYYYMMDD; using 4 digits for the calendar year (YYYY) and, optionally, 2 digits for the month (MM) (for example April = 04) and 2 digits for the day (DD). When no specific month and/or day is required/known, the values are replaced with dashes (-). The date range of a recurring event or occurrence must be encoded using periodicDateRange.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Frequency Pair
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: A pair of frequencies for transmitting and receiving radio signals. The shore station transmits and receives on the frequencies indicated.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Information
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Textual information about the feature. The information may be provided as a string of text or as a file name of a single external text file that contains the text.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: At least one of the sub-attributes file reference or text must be populated.The sub-attribute file reference is generally used for long text strings or those that require formatting, however, there is no restriction on the type of text (except for lexical level) that can be held in files referenced by sub-attribute file reference.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Online Resource
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Information about online sources from which a resource or data can be obtained.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Periodic Date Range
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The active period of a recurring event or occurrence.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Radiocommunications
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Detailed radiocommunications description with channels, frequencies, preferences and time schedules.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Telecommunications
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: A means or channel of communicating at a distance by electrical or electromagnetic means such as telegraphy, telephony, or broadcasting.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: If no value is populated for the sub-attribute telecommunication service, this means the service is by voice communication. If no value is populated for the sub-attribute telecommunication carrier, this means the service is by land line communication.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Text Content
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Textual material, or a pointer to a resource providing textual material. May be accompanied by basic information about its source and relationship to the source.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Exactly one of sub-attributes onlineResource or information must be completed in one instance of textContent. Product specifications may restrict the use or content of onlineResource for security. For example, a product specification may forbid populating onlineResource. Product specification authors must consider whether applications using the data product may be prevented from accessing off-system resources by security policies.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Time Intervals by Day of Week
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The regular weekly operation times of a service or schedule.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Times of Transmission
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: One or more times in the day when the radio station starts a routine transmission, normally expressed in UTC or local time.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Authority
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to an Authority object

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Contact details
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to an Contact Details object

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The marine protected area
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The marine protected area for which the authority is responsible

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Protected area authority
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: Authority responsible for a protected area.
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:remarks: There may be more than one such authority depending on how responsibilities are divided.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Information Type
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Generalized information type which carries all the common attributes.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Authority
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: A person or organisation having political or administrative power and control.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Contact Details
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Information on how to reach a person or organisation by postal, internet, telephone, telex and radio systems.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Marine Protected Area
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: Any area of the intertidal or sub-tidal terrain, together with its overlying water and associated flora, fauna, historical and cultural features, which has been reserved by law or other effective means to protect part or all of the enclosed environment.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Vessel Traffic Service Area
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: The area of any service implemented by a relevant authority primarily designed to improve safety and efficiency of traffic flow and the protection of the environment. It may range from simple information messages, to extensive organisation of the traffic involving national or regional schemes.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Feature Type
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: Generalized feature type which carries all the common attributes.
